page.title: 07LIFESTYLE SARAH'S DAY
page.content: I get up at about a quarter past 8. When I am dressed,I go downstairs to breakfast.I normally have Weetabix and a drink of tea.If there are no Weetabix I have Frosties.Then I go to school.I sometimes go on my bike or walk but if it is raining my mum takes me in the car.School starts at nine o' clock.We have a short assembly,then we do maths.At half past ten we have playtime.Then we do English or we finish off other work or do project work or read or play our recorders or have P.E..We have dinner at twelve o' clock.We normally finish dinner at about 25 past twelve.Then we have another play.We come in again at one o'clock.Sometimes we do music or have a story.Home time is at half past 3.At half past 5,when dad comes home we have tea.I go to bed at about 9 o'clock.
